title: Northeast Headlands, Appledore
credit_line: Purchase: gift of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Childe Hassam [1859-1935], until 1935; American Academy of Arts and Letters [1904-], New York, 1935; (Milch Galleries [1912-1981], New York, 1950); John Fox, Boston, MA; (Milch Galleries and Hirschl and Adler Galleries, New York, 1960); Mr. and Mrs. T. Williams Middendorf II, Greenwich, CT, 1965. (Hirschl and Adler Galleries, 1966); with Bernard Danenberg Galleries, New York, 1969; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1970.

Under review by CGK

creator.death_place: East Hampton (Suffolk county, New York state, United States)
